text:
Hello we are a 501c3 non-profit with a broken coded element. Our blogs used to show arrows in the hyperlink but something happened, can anyone please help? I attached a picture of what the hyperlinked text should look like, our previous developer Hubsnacks coded this element and said:

We have created a CSS pseudo script for it which will target only the blog body post to avoid conflict with other links which are links but not hyperlinks.
Link to preview:
Screenshot: <https://prnt.sc/19rlq7d>
Page view: <https://www.assuaged.com/news/vegan-leather-the-fashionably-sustainable-cruelty-free-option?hs_preview=PVgRNMbx-32303811375>

PICTURE ATTACHED, any help is greatly appreciate TYSM!!!
